name: ScienceLoop
description: AI4Science project for understanding scientific papers

PaperUnderstandingAgent.description: Analyzes scientific PDFs to extract formulas, variables, relationships, and key ideas

arguments.name: pdf
arguments.description: Path to PDF file inside /papers directory

KnowledgeGraphAgent.description: Builds a scientific knowledge graph from Step 1 JSON output

arguments.name: input
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from Step 1 (PaperUnderstandingAgent output)

arguments.name: stdin
arguments.description: Read JSON from stdin instead of file

HypothesisAgent.description: Generates scientific hypotheses from paper understanding and knowledge graph using Claude 4.5 Sonnet

arguments.name: input
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from Step 1 (PaperUnderstandingAgent output)

arguments.name: kg
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from KnowledgeGraphAgent (knowledge graph with nodes and edges)

SimulationPlanAgent.description: Generates a precise, simulation-ready plan from hypothesis, paper understanding, and knowledge graph using Claude 4.5 Sonnet

arguments.name: hypothesis
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from HypothesisAgent (hypothesis output)

arguments.name: paper
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from PaperUnderstandingAgent (Step 1 output with formulas, variables, relationships)

arguments.name: kg
arguments.description: Path to JSON file from KnowledgeGraphAgent (knowledge graph with nodes and edges)
